home.title: Hey!
home.subtitle: What are we painting today?
home.tagline: From sketch to wall, guided by AI

colors.title: Colors
colors.overviewSubtitle: Access your favorite series or explore the catalog.
colors.noFavoriteSeries: Add series to favorites from a brand.

doodles.subtitle: Simulator projects: wall and sketch overlaid.
doodles.emptyHint: Tap to create your first project (wall + sketch).
doodles.createPlaceholder: Step 1: select wall image and sketch image — coming soon.
doodles.step1Subtitle: Pick the wall photo and the sketch you want to overlay.
doodles.permissionDenied: Gallery access is needed to pick images.
doodles.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access is needed to take photos.
doodles.editorPlaceholder: Step 2: editor (scale, rotation, perspective) — coming soon.
doodles.deleteDoodleMessage: This doodle will be deleted. This cannot be undone.

profile.akaHint: We'll use it to greet you on the home screen.

scan.title: Scan
scan.imagePlaceholder: Take a photo or pick an image to analyze its colors.
scan.permissionsDenied: Camera and photo permissions are required to scan images.
scan.noColorsFound: Could not detect prominent colors in this image.
scan.errorProcessing: Something went wrong while processing the image.
scan.suggestionsEmpty: Scan an image to see matching spray colors.

wall.title: Wall
wall.subtitle: Overlay your sketch on a wall photo for precise positioning
wall.cameraPermissionMessage: WallAI needs camera access to show the live view and overlay your sketch on the wall.
wall.noLayersSubtitle: Add a background and/or sketch image. You can pick from gallery or take a photo for each layer.
wall.noLayersHint: Background appears behind the sketch. Both can be scaled, moved, and adjusted. Changes are saved automatically.
wall.noSketchSubtitle: Pick an image from your gallery to use as your sketch, then point the camera at the wall to overlay it.
wall.removeSketchMessage: This will remove the overlay. You can add a new sketch anytime.
wall.removeBackgroundMessage: This will remove the background layer. You can add a new one anytime.
wall.removeBackgroundError: Could not remove the background. Try another image or try again.
wall.removeBackgroundUnavailable: Background removal requires a development build. Run: npx expo run:android or npx expo run:ios, then try again.
wall.cameraUnavailableMessage: The camera module is only available on a physical device. Run the app with a development build: npx expo run:ios or npx expo run:android.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Manage your graffiti projects and color palettes
projects.noPalettes: No palettes yet. Create one in the Catalog tab.
projects.noWalls: No wall projects yet. Create one in the Wall tab.
projects.removePaletteMessage: This palette will be deleted. This cannot be undone.
projects.removeWallMessage: This project will be deleted. This cannot be undone.

palettes.subtitle: Create color palettes or import them from an image.
palettes.noPalettes: No palettes yet. Create a new one to get started.
palettes.emptyHint: Tap to create your first palette.
palettes.selectBrandsSubtitle: Choose which brands or series to pick colors from.
palettes.selectSeriesSubtitle: Choose which series to pick colors from.
palettes.selectMatchPerColor: Choose one color per extracted swatch for your palette.
